revised_title: Influence of Coal-Dust on Colliery Explosions: Further Experiments and Observations
tldr: The author conducts a series of experiments to investigate the effects of coal-dust on colliery explosions. By controlling variables such as air-tightness and gas-air mixture, the author demonstrates the significant role of coal-dust in the propagation of flames in coal mines. The findings emphasize the importance of understanding and mitigating the risks associated with coal-dust explosions for mine safety.
